location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Supplementary Map to Area No. 6 Showing Tribal Dispositions Round the Hammar Lake'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in Colour on PaperDimensions: 360 x 368mm

mods.abstract: This map shows the approximate distribution of various tribal groups in the Lower Euphrates region of Iraq. The map also covers some aspects of the region's settlements, hydrology (lakes, rivers), as well as infrastructure relevant for military purposes.
